original_text: Hiram's ships had brought gold from Ophir. They also brought from there large loads of good wood, and valuable jewels.
korean_text: 오빌에서부터 금을 실어온 히람의 배들이 오빌에서 많은 백단목과 보석을 운반하여 오매

sentences.original_text: Hiram's ships had brought gold from Ophir
They also brought from there large loads of good wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그곳에서 좋은 나무를 크게 실어왔습니다
